h1. Generic tool support
 

The purpose of this interface is to decouple the VM implementation from any specific tooling interface, such as [JVMTI|http://docs.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/platform/jvmti/jvmti.html], and allow multiple tooling interfaces to be implemented without modifying the VM.
